title: Win a year-long ROUVY subscription, a jersey and bib shorts worth over £400
content:
Cyclist
Win a year-long ROUVY subscription, a jersey and bib shorts worth over £400

ROUVY is the realistic indoor cycling app that lets you ride, race and train on the world’s most scenic routes. Complete the brief survey below and you could win a ROUVY prize bundle worth over £400 – with both men’s and women’s kit available.

Explore six continents and every cycling route imaginable with ROUVY. Stay true to what made you fall in love with cycling in the first place, even when you’re riding indoors.

If you have a specific fitness goal or simply want to keep yourself motivated, there’s a workout out there that you will love.

Imagine a place you’ve always wanted to explore on your bike and start your journey.

  • Complete this survey to be in with a chance to win

The legal bit: Open to UK residents only, entries must be received by 23:59 on 25th December 2024. This competition is being sponsored by INDOOR CYCLING JUST GOT REAL | ROUVY. Your answers to the survey will be shared with ROUVY, however the email address you provide will only be used to contact you if you win the competition. The winner will be selected at random and notified by email in January 2025. Note we do not sell, rent or share your data with third parties without your consent. Metropolis respects the privacy of every person for whom we have personal data. The group privacy and cookies policy can be viewed here along with Cyclist’s standard competition terms here.

The post Win a year-long ROUVY subscription, a jersey and bib shorts worth over £400 appeared first on Cyclist.
author: Will Strickson | Website Editor
